callback_with_context.context_function_id: Component("C3130CDE-C01E-4747-BA976FD9E6BCC592").CurrentSelection #little bit of a hack to propagate the initial empty selection of the parent. multiple context callbacks below need the CcoContextSelection before they can evaluate

unit_card.comment: ScottB: The ContextPropagator that passes own context to self for unit record is to make it refresh when change selection, in the event that the list itself isnt refreshed when changed character selection

inactive.name: inactive
inactive.tooltip: No upgrades are currently unlocked for this unit. Increase this unit's unit caps from the Armoury Tab in order to unlock further upgrades

component_text.text: Increase unit caps within the Armoury tab in order to unlock upgrades for each unit group. Once upgrades are unlocked select the section in order to upgrade the units from that group.
